metadata.title: CVE-2019-16395 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
GnuCOBOL 2.2 has a stack-based buffer overflow in the cb_name() function incobc/tree.c via crafted COBOL source code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnucobol - 4.0~early~20200606-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnucobol package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0~early~20200606-3').
